projects.company: IBM's involvement in the Masters Tournament primarily revolves around providing innovative technology solutions to enhance the viewing experience for both on-site spectators and global audiences. Watson is a powerful artificial intelligence (AI) system developed by IBM (International Business Machines Corporation). IBM Watson is designed to process and analyze large volumes of data, understand natural language, and provide insights and answers to complex questions.

projects.title: Open House Chicago 2023 - Chicago Architecture Center
projects.subtitle: The Official Mobile App of OHC 2023
projects.company: The Chicago Architecture Center (CAC) stands as a distinguished institution committed to fostering widespread comprehension and admiration for architecture and the built environment, with a special emphasis on the captivating city of Chicago.
projects.description: Every October, the Chicago Architecture Center is proud to host Open House Chicagoâ€”a free public festival that offers self-guided history and architecture trails throughout Chicago, talks and programming, and behind-the-scenes access to architecturally, historically and culturally significant sites across the city. Open House Chicago remains one of the largest events of its kind in the world. Such apps typically provide users with essential information about the event, including a list of participating buildings, their locations, architectural details, and any special programming or events associated with them. The app may also feature interactive maps, itineraries, and tools to help users plan their visits and make the most of the Open House Chicago experience. Additionally, users might find features for favoriting or bookmarking buildings they are interested in, receiving notifications about upcoming events, and accessing real-time updates.

projects.company: David Geffen Hall is a prominent concert hall located in Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts in New York City. It is one of the major venues for classical music performances in the city. The hall is home to the New York Philharmonic, one of the leading orchestras in the United States.

about.title: I've been devving for over five years.
Bit of an analog kid n a digital world.
Besides websites, I make music, pottery, and memories in the natural world.
